articles.title: Huddersfield Town's new man-love duo offers winning combination on and off the pitch - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: Elias Kachunga and Collin Quaner were the Terriers' most genuinely adorable best friend double-act but that mantle has now been taken up by Harry Toffolo and Lewis O'Brien
articles.content:
There is nothing more endearing in life, let alone in football, than seeing two people who clearly enjoy one another's company bouncing off one another and sharing a mutual affection.
